Plot: As the zombies storyline draws to a close, the four original heroes Dempsey, Nikoli, Takeo and Richtofen must stop the evil Shadow Man and his apothicon allies from wreaking havoc on the universe
Title: Call of Duty: Revelations
Writer: Jason Blundell (story), Craig Houston, Corky Lehmkuhl (story)
Actors: Steve Blum, Tom Kane, Malcolm McDowell, Nolan North
